author: ralexstokes
content: <@550420431744794624> has been following the standardization process here

author: carlbeek
content:
Yup, purely cosmetic for SWU we are using with `BLS12381G1-SHA256-SSWU-RO-`. The change dramatically improves the spec readability.

The one potential change is that in order to call something an implementation of the hash-to-curve spec, it needs to implement constant time operations for the utility functions.

author: carlbeek
content: I'm also not impressed by the size of the merge. The commits go back as far as July and change notes would be nice, but it doesn't harm us.
